alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Gulf and Franklin Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 113 PM EDT/1213 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carrabelle to 11 miles west of Apalachicola. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Port St. Joe, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, Odena, Indian Pass, Beverly, Milltown, Bay City, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Simmons Bayou, Hays Place, Fort Gadsden, Nine Mile and Buck Siding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
